frames.content:
Without Hard Work,
Nothing Grows

Gordon Dunn, a famed scientific pioneer, is mysteriously found dead just after the unveiling
of his newest work, a groundbreaking device able to extract, record and play a person’s
unfiltered memories. After his death, Gordon’s reclusive wife, Carolyn.

his safe, normal, and unheroic life.

1914 translation by H. Rackham

CONTACT US

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source.
